name: Abanden
description:
For GBJAM 9. Maze game where the stages are randomly generated.

Pick one of two characters each with different abilities.

B (z) attack. A (x) Special when meter is filled. START(enter) pause. D-PAD(arrows) move.

Go to an Abandoned thieves den to get the treasure left behind, but now it is overrun with serpents and bats.
